state.code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant FrontEnd
    participant Middleware
    participant MongoDB

    User ->> FrontEnd: Open Create Event Form
    User ->> FrontEnd: Fill Event Details
    User ->> FrontEnd: Submit Event
    FrontEnd ->> Middleware: POST /api/events (Event Details)
    Middleware ->> MongoDB: insert_one(Event)
    MongoDB -->> Middleware: Acknowledge Event Created
    Middleware -->> FrontEnd: HTTP 201 Created
    FrontEnd -->> User: Event Created Confirmation

    User ->> FrontEnd: Request to View Events
    FrontEnd ->> Middleware: GET /api/my_events
    Middleware ->> MongoDB: find({ "creator": user_id })
    MongoDB -->> Middleware: Return Event List
    Middleware -->> FrontEnd: JSON Event List
    FrontEnd -->> User: Display Events

    note over Middleware: Gossip Protocol Begins
    loop Periodic Gossip
        Middleware ->> Middleware: Select random subset of nodes
        Middleware ->> MongoDB: Get Membership List and Heartbeat Info
        MongoDB -->> Middleware: Return Membership List and Heartbeat Info
        Middleware ->> Middleware: Merge Membership Lists
        Middleware ->> MongoDB: Update Membership List and Heartbeat Info
        MongoDB -->> Middleware: Acknowledge Update
    end
    note over Middleware: Gossip Protocol Ends

graph TD;
    subgraph User_Device
        browser[Browser]
    end

    subgraph Front_End
        A[HTML/JavaScript]
        B[Event Form]
        C[Event List]
    end

    subgraph Middleware
        D[Flask Application]
        E[EventController]
        F[UserController]
        G[Letting-It-Be Protocol]
        H[Gossip Protocol]
        I[Membership List]
        J[Reputation Scores]
    end

    subgraph Database
        K[MongoDB]
        L[Events Collection]
        M[Users Collection]
        N[Dependencies Collection]
    end

    browser --> A
    A --> B
    A --> C
    B --> D
    C --> D

    D --> E
    D --> F
    E --> G
    F --> G
    E --> H
    H --> I
    H --> J

    E --> L
    F --> M
    G --> N
    H --> N
    I --> K
    J --> K
    K --> L
    K --> M
    K --> N

graph TD;
    subgraph User_Device
        browser[Browser]
    end

    subgraph Server
        web_server[Flask Middleware]
        db_server[MongoDB Database]
    end

    browser --> web_server
    web_server --> db_server
